properties.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Casper Mountain
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 4:56AM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service Office in Riverton.

* WHAT...Snow showers. Brief moderate to heavy is snow possible
with visibility reduced to around a half mile.

* WHERE...Natrona County.

* SNOWFALL TOTALS...New snowfall of an inch or two, especially
where the heavier snow showers occur.

* WHEN...Today.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roads will be slick and hazardous with
winter driving conditions expected for the morning commute. The
evening commute may also be impacted by winter weather.

NWSheadline: Snow at times Today across Natrona County
